I had to give my insurance today an approximation of what I might earn next year and I was like, man, absolutely no idea.

easily worst year for me as well. i have a good support net rn but if this continues for longer i will have to seriously think about doing art as a job. tbh, i don't think i heard of a single artist this year that they had a banger year
